images.caption: Figure 1:The distribution of LiveSecBench v251030 dataset, including statistics on evaluation dimensions and topics. Note that onlyLegality, Ethics, Factuality, and Privacydimensions are equipped with independent data; theAdversarial Robustness and Reasoning Safetyare evaluated with reused questions from the above dimensions.
Figure 2:Heatmap of each model in ELO battle wining rages.
